meanings.definition: A cell that has secreted the matrix of cartilage and become embedded in it.
meanings.sent1: Chondrocytes are cells that make the stuff that holds cartilage together.
meanings.sent2: The chondrocytes in the cartilage help maintain its structure.
meanings.sent3: The chondrocytes had a party in the cartilage matrix last night!
meanings.sent4: Like tiny architects, chondrocytes build the cartilage matrix brick by brick.
meanings.sent5: In the world of cartilage, chondrocytes are the busy workers creating the foundation.

meanings.sent1: When chondrocytes mature, they become specialized cartilage cells.
meanings.sent2: Healthy cartilage relies on the presence of mature chondrocytes.
meanings.sent3: The wise old chondrocytes shared stories of their cartilage adventures.
meanings.sent4: Mature chondrocytes are like the wise elders of the cartilage community.
meanings.sent5: In the land of cartilage, mature chondrocytes reign supreme with their experience.
